quote: Art is whatever you can get away with.
author: Marshall McLuhan,  The Medium is the Massage

quote: What is art but a way of seeing?
author: Saul Bellow

quote: The arts are not a way to make a living. They are a very human way of making life more bearable. Practicing an art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow, for heaven's sake.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Art depends on luck and talent.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: Art doesn't interest me. Only artists interest me.
author: Marcel Duchamp

quote: In art the best is good enough.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I never called my work an 'art'. It's part of show business, the business of building entertainment.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Art is the objectification of feeling.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Art is a marriage of the conscious and the unconscious.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: Art is a way to express yourself and through that you can escape a bad situation.
author: Russell Simmons

quote: Art is I; science is we.
author: Claude Bernard

quote: Art is a harmony parallel with nature.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: Art is accusation, expression, passion. Art is a fight to the finish between black charcoal and white paper.
author: Gunter Grass

quote: Art is science made clear.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: One great function of the arts is to keep ideals alive in a culture that does not yet realize them.
author: Susan Neiman,  Moral Clarity: A Guide for Grown-up Idealists

quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: To do a dull thing with style-now that's what I call art.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Art has the power to transform, to illuminate, to educate, inspire and motivate.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
author: Thomas Merton,  No Man Is an Island

quote: Painting and writing are solitary arts.
author: Conrad Hall

quote: Art is the reflection of an imaginative mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I don't believe in art. I believe in artists.
author: Marcel Duchamp

quote: What an artist is trying to do for people is bring them closer to something, because of course art is about sharing. You wouldn't be an artist unless you wanted to share an experience, a thought.
author: David Hockney

quote: Art to me is an anecdote of the spirit, and the only means of making concrete the purpose of its varied quickness and stillness.
author: Mark Rothko

quote: Art is subject to arbitrary fashion.
author: Kary Mullis

quote: Art in the classroom not only spurs creativity, it also inspires learning.
author: Mickey Hart

quote: Art is a critical component in a well-rounded education. Art is the level playing field - no matter how rich or poor, tall or short, pretty or ugly to the bone, if you can draw, you can find personal fulfillment and build self-confidence. Art is the highest achievement of mankind.
author: Lynda Resnick

quote: A work of art is a world in itself reflecting senses and emotions of the artist's world.
author: Hans Hofmann

quote: Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Art is for everybody.
author: Keith Haring

quote: Art resides in the quality of doing, process is not magic.
author: Charles Eames

quote: Art is the desire of a man to express himself, to record the reactions of his personality to the world he lives in.
author: Amy Lowell

quote: Art is nothing but the expression of our dream; the more we surrender to it the closer we get to the inner truth of things, our dream-life, the true life that scorns questions and does not see them.
author: Franz Marc

quote: Fine art is knowledge made visible.
author: Gustave Courbet

quote: When you make art, you get really invested in it. When art happens by accident and you were just along for the ride? It's way more fun.
author: Patrick Stump

quote: It is art that makes life, makes interest, makes importance and I know of no substitute whatever for the force and beauty of its process.
author: Max Eastman

quote: Art is the proper task of life.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love art in yourself, and not yourself in art.
author: Konstantin Stanislavski,  My Life In Art

quote: I believe entertainment can aspire to be art, and can become art, but if you set out to make art you're an idiot.
author: Steve Martin

quote: I don't think about art when I'm working. I try to think about life.
author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quote: There is nothing new in art except talent.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: Making art is not the matter of a moment, and nor is making an exhibition; curating follows art.
author: Hans-Ulrich Obrist

quote: Performance has to be mainstream art. This is what I'm fighting for.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: Art is the triumph over chaos.
author: John Cheever

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

quote: I have had this longstanding interest in going back to school to get a Ph.D. in art history. I was especially interested in exploring this idea of the ecstatic impulse in an artist.
author: Jandy Nelson

quote: I especially love all the instruments of art: inks, pens, paintbrushes, watercolors and oils, fine papers and canvases, and although I love to mess around with these tools and objects, I have minimal artistic skills.
author: Sharon Creech

quote: It's clever, but is it Art?
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: It is art that makes life, makes interest, makes importance... and I know of no substitute whatever for the force and beauty of its process.
author: Henry James
